body_html: Guys, thanks to @lchen23, I found the root cause of this issue. It's about intel-openmp. If you installed the conda-forge version, then this issue will emerge. The way to fix it is very simple: conda install -c defaults intel-openmp -f.
body_text: Guys, thanks to @lchen23, I found the root cause of this issue. It's about intel-openmp. If you installed the conda-forge version, then this issue will emerge. The way to fix it is very simple: conda install -c defaults intel-openmp -f.
body: Guys, thanks to @lchen23, I found the root cause of this issue. It's about intel-openmp. If you installed the conda-forge version, then this issue will emerge. The way to fix it is very simple: `conda install -c defaults intel-openmp -f`.
